message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I think I can do better than that, Alice. Your turn is next!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, Bob. Will you accept?
You're getting closer, Alice, but I'm not there yet. What's your next move?
I'm getting closer to your target, Bob. Is this the one?
You're getting close, Alice, but I'm not budging. I think I can do better than that.
I'm trying to find a balance, Bob. Will you meet me in the middle?
I'm not going to get any closer than that, Alice. Take it or leave it!
